name: mongokit
description: MongoKit framework try to keep its simplicity when you manage mongodb in python. MongoKit was developed to be fast and light with KISS and DRY in mind. MongoKit brings structured schema and validation layer on top of the great pymongo driver. Discuss with us on Google group : http://groups.google.com/group/mongokit or follow the news on Twitter: http://twitter.com/namlook
